jobDescription: Direct Hire Opportunity!!!  Audio/Visual Project Manager  Outsource is currently looking for an Audio/Visual Project Manager with roughly 5+ years of experience in the Audio/Visual industry. We have a great Direct Hire opportunity in the Redwood City, CA area. Our client is looking to bring someone on immediately.  Please send resumes to Holly Andrews: holly@outsource.net Qualifications: Minimum of 5+ years of experience as a Project Manager and Technician in the Audio/Visual Industry.  Extensive knowledge of installation, maintenance, and service of Audio/Visual systems within a Commercial/High Tech environment.  Experience with running jobs, managing employees, estimating, site surveys, preparing bids and quality control and service/installation work.  Ability to work as a leader without supervision.  Must be able to work in a very fast paced environment.  Relevant industry certifications preferred. About Outsource: Outsource is the Nations leading providers of candidates in the Electrical and Wiring Industries. We work EXCLUSIVELY in building wiring, and we have been placing technicians of all levels with the right companies since 1998 so we know a thing or two about making a good match.
